revised_title: Obituary of William John Macquorn Rankine: A Pioneering Engineer and Scientist
tldr: The article is an obituary for William John Macquorn Rankine, a renowned engineer and scientist who made significant contributions to the dynamical theory of heat, steam-engine theory, wave theory in liquids, and ship resistance and hydraulics. His work was highly influential and his textbooks were widely used by both scientists and engineers.
